text:
Links without protocol e.g. <a href="//www.example.com/> are not rewritten if you use ProxyHTMLURLMap http://www.example.com http://myproxy.com

This configuration has to be used instead:
ProxyHTMLURLMap //www.example.com http://myproxy.com
creator: Alexander_Pircher@yahoo.de
nick@webthing.com
text: I don't see how this is a bug.  You already figured out how to configure it to do what you want.  All as designed.
